Functional + Object-oriented language on JVM.

- Spark is written in Scala
- Functional paradigm
- Type safety
- Concise code

slides.title: Scala Basics
slides.content:
# Scala Basics ğŸ”§

## Core Concepts

```scala
// Immutable by default
val x = 10
var y = 20  // mutable

// Functions
def add(a: Int, b: Int): Int = a + b

// Collections
val list = List(1, 2, 3)
list.map(_ * 2)  // [2, 4, 6]

// Case classes
case class Person(name: String, age: Int)
```

> ğŸ¯ Immutability and functions are key!

slides.title: Spark with Scala
slides.content:
# Spark with Scala âš¡

```scala
import org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession

val spark = SparkSession.builder
    .appName("MyApp")
    .getOrCreate()

val df = spark.read.csv("data.csv")
df.filter(df("age") > 30)
    .groupBy("city")
    .count()
    .show()
```

> ğŸ¯ Native Spark = best performance!
